testcase.name: Register with multiple users
testcase.system-out: Given I am able to navigate to landing page.................................passed When I click on SignUp button...............................................passed When I enter firstname as "<firstname>".....................................passed When I enter lastname as "<lastname>".......................................passed When I enter email as "<email>".............................................passed When I enter username as "<username>".......................................passed When I enter password as "<password>".......................................passed Then click on Register button...............................................passed And Validate if correct email ID "<email>" is populated.....................passed
